input: Each State Party shall take appropriate measures, in accordance with its constitutional processes, to prohibit and prevent any activity prohibited to a State Party under this Convention.
target: {"ambiguous_terms": [{"term": "appropriate measures", "reason": "No criteria specified for what constitutes 'appropriate' - leaves discretion to states"}, {"term": "in accordance with its constitutional processes", "reason": "Varies by country, could delay implementation indefinitely"}]}

input: States Parties shall endeavor to cooperate in good faith to prevent the weaponization of outer space.
target: {"ambiguous_terms": [{"term": "endeavor to", "reason": "Non-binding aspirational language, not a firm obligation"}, {"term": "good faith", "reason": "Subjective standard with no objective criteria"}, {"term": "weaponization", "reason": "Term not defined - unclear if includes dual-use technologies"}]}

input: The Parties shall promptly notify each other of any significant incident that may affect the implementation of this Agreement.
target: {"ambiguous_terms": [{"term": "promptly", "reason": "No specific timeframe - could mean hours, days, or weeks"}, {"term": "significant incident", "reason": "No threshold or criteria for what qualifies as 'significant'"}, {"term": "may affect", "reason": "Speculative standard - unclear when notification is required"}]}

input: Each Party shall reduce its aggregate number of deployed strategic warheads to a level substantially below current deployment levels.
target: {"ambiguous_terms": [{"term": "substantially below", "reason": "No specific number or percentage defined"}, {"term": "current deployment levels", "reason": "Reference point unclear - date of signature, ratification, or entry into force?"}]}

input: Members shall ensure that their laws and regulations are administered in a uniform, impartial and reasonable manner.
target: {"ambiguous_terms": [{"term": "uniform", "reason": "Unclear if this means identical treatment or consistent principles"}, {"term": "impartial", "reason": "Subjective standard open to interpretation"}, {"term": "reasonable manner", "reason": "No objective criteria for reasonableness"}]}

input: Technical regulations shall not be more trade-restrictive than necessary to fulfil a legitimate objective.
target: {"ambiguous_terms": [{"term": "more trade-restrictive than necessary", "reason": "Requires proportionality assessment with no clear methodology"}, {"term": "legitimate objective", "reason": "List of objectives may not be exhaustive - opens interpretive questions"}]}

input: Each Party shall accord to service suppliers of any other Party treatment no less favourable than that it accords, in like circumstances, to its own service suppliers.
target: {"ambiguous_terms": [{"term": "in like circumstances", "reason": "Key qualifier that is highly fact-specific and contested"}, {"term": "treatment no less favourable", "reason": "Requires comparison that may be difficult to operationalize"}]}

input: Developed country Parties shall provide financial resources to assist developing country Parties to meet the agreed full incremental costs of implementing measures.
target: {"ambiguous_terms": [{"term": "agreed full incremental costs", "reason": "Calculation methodology disputed - baseline unclear"}, {"term": "assist", "reason": "Does not specify level or form of assistance required"}]}

input: Each Party shall take measures to conserve and sustainably use biological diversity within its jurisdiction.
target: {"ambiguous_terms": [{"term": "sustainably use", "reason": "Sustainability criteria not specified"}, {"term": "conserve", "reason": "Level of conservation effort not defined"}, {"term": "biological diversity", "reason": "While defined elsewhere, scope of 'within jurisdiction' adds ambiguity for transboundary resources"}]}

input: Parties should protect the climate system for the benefit of present and future generations of humankind, on the basis of equity and in accordance with their common but differentiated responsibilities and respective capabilities.
target: {"ambiguous_terms": [{"term": "should", "reason": "Hortatory rather than mandatory language"}, {"term": "equity", "reason": "Highly contested concept in climate negotiations"}, {"term": "common but differentiated responsibilities", "reason": "Differentiation criteria remain disputed"}, {"term": "respective capabilities", "reason": "No objective measure of capability"}]}

input: States Parties undertake to submit to the Committee periodic reports on measures adopted to give effect to the rights recognized in the Covenant.
target: {"ambiguous_terms": [{"term": "periodic reports", "reason": "Frequency not specified in this provision"}, {"term": "measures adopted", "reason": "Does not specify if legislative, administrative, or both"}, {"term": "give effect to", "reason": "Level of implementation effort unclear"}]}

input: No one shall be subjected to torture or to cruel, inhuman or degrading treatment or punishment.
target: {"ambiguous_terms": [{"term": "cruel", "reason": "Subjective assessment that may vary by culture and context"}, {"term": "inhuman", "reason": "Threshold for inhumanity not defined"}, {"term": "degrading", "reason": "Lower threshold than torture but boundaries unclear"}]}

input: Everyone has the right to a standard of living adequate for the health and well-being of himself and of his family.
target: {"ambiguous_terms": [{"term": "adequate", "reason": "No minimum standards specified"}, {"term": "health and well-being", "reason": "Broad concepts without measurable criteria"}, {"term": "standard of living", "reason": "Components not enumerated in this provision"}]}

input: High-risk AI systems shall be designed and developed in such a way that they achieve an appropriate level of accuracy, robustness and cybersecurity.
target: {"ambiguous_terms": [{"term": "high-risk", "reason": "Classification criteria complex and evolving"}, {"term": "appropriate level", "reason": "No specific metrics or thresholds defined"}, {"term": "accuracy", "reason": "Measurement methodology not specified"}, {"term": "robustness", "reason": "Technical meaning may vary by context"}]}

input: AI systems that interact with natural persons shall be designed to inform those persons that they are interacting with an AI system, unless this is obvious from the circumstances.
target: {"ambiguous_terms": [{"term": "interact with", "reason": "Scope of interaction unclear - direct conversation only or any interface?"}, {"term": "obvious from the circumstances", "reason": "Subjective exception that undermines the rule"}]}

input: Member States shall ensure that AI systems are used in a manner that respects human dignity and fundamental rights.
target: {"ambiguous_terms": [{"term": "respects", "reason": "Level of respect or compliance not specified"}, {"term": "human dignity", "reason": "Philosophical concept with varied interpretations"}, {"term": "fundamental rights", "reason": "Which rights are 'fundamental' may vary by jurisdiction"}]}

input: States should take all feasible precautions in the choice of means and methods of attack with a view to avoiding, and in any event to minimizing, incidental loss of civilian life.
target: {"ambiguous_terms": [{"term": "should", "reason": "Non-binding recommendation rather than obligation"}, {"term": "feasible precautions", "reason": "Feasibility is situational and subjective"}, {"term": "minimizing", "reason": "No standard for minimum acceptable harm"}]}

input: The Organization shall facilitate cooperation and consultation among Member States regarding significant market disruptions.
target: {"ambiguous_terms": [{"term": "facilitate", "reason": "Weak obligation - does not require achieving outcomes"}, {"term": "significant market disruptions", "reason": "No threshold or criteria for significance"}, {"term": "cooperation and consultation", "reason": "Procedural rather than substantive commitment"}]}

input: Parties shall take effective measures to reduce pollution from land-based sources to levels that are not harmful to the marine environment.
target: {"ambiguous_terms": [{"term": "effective measures", "reason": "Effectiveness criteria not specified"}, {"term": "not harmful", "reason": "Harm threshold undefined - zero harm or acceptable levels?"}, {"term": "marine environment", "reason": "Geographic and ecological scope may be unclear"}]}

input: Each State Party shall progressively achieve the full realization of the rights recognized in this Covenant by all appropriate means.
target: {"ambiguous_terms": [{"term": "progressively achieve", "reason": "No timeline or milestones for progress"}, {"term": "full realization", "reason": "End state not clearly defined"}, {"term": "all appropriate means", "reason": "Leaves choice of means entirely to states"}]}
